definitions.definition: the action of repeating something that has already been said or written.
examples: her comments are worthy of repetition
synonyms: parroting "endless repetition of passages of poetry"

definitions.definition: the recurrence of an action or event.
examples: there was to be no repetition of the interwar years
synonyms: instant replay "a repetition of the scene in the kitchen"

examples: the geometric repetitions of Islamic art

definitions.definition: a training exercise that is repeated, especially a series of repeated raisings and lowerings of the weight in weight training.
the repeating of a passage or note.
a piece set by a teacher to be learned by heart and recited.
